text: @GregAbbott_TX Dude, just since Wednesday morning Texas has confirmed over 2,300 new cases and we’ve lost over 110 more Texans to COVID-19 between yesterday & today. Meanwhile we still rank in the bottom 5 of the 50 states in testing per capita. #texasdeservesbetter #COVIDー19
